text:
@realDonaldTrump Coronavirus 5/26/20

Cases: 1,715,297 
Deaths: 100,187 Recovered: 469,064 
That's in increase of 16,333 DEATHS in one week.  And you're saying States should open up ASAP?  EVERYTHING is NOT about you and your Stock Market.  We've NEVER had a heartless President before you!!! https://t.co/regfaxCWz5
